name: Project Glitch
description: Do you think you have what it takes to become a video game play tester? Start working at Game Dev Inc. today to find out! We currently have three projects in Beta development, and they are just riddled with bugs and glitches. We need your help to find and document all the bugs.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
